/// Loading the Games and Pits from the server at start up ...

/// Checks if the given password is valid ...

marker.ph: /// Interaction logic for App.xaml ...

<<Window.Content> <StackPanel> <Label Content="Enter Password:"/> <PasswordBox Name="PasswordBox" PasswordChanged="PasswordBox_OnPasswordChanged" Margin="20,10"/> <scoutingApp:MsgLabel x:Name="MsgLabel" Visibility="Collapsed"/> <Button Content="Continue" HorizontalAlignment="Center" Click="Submit_OnClick"/> </StackPanel> </Window.Content>.../>

<<Window.Resources>
<ControlTemplate x:Key="TextBoxBaseControlTemplate" TargetType="TextBox"> <Border Background="{TemplateBinding Background}" x:Name="Bd" BorderBrush="Gray" BorderThickness="{TemplateBinding BorderThickness}" CornerRadius="10"> <ScrollViewer x:Name="PART_ContentHost"/> </Border> <ControlTemplate.Triggers> <Trigger Property="IsEnabled" Value="False"> <Setter Property="Background" Value="{DynamicResource {x:Static SystemColors.ControlBrushKey}}" TargetName="Bd"/> <Setter Property="Foreground" Value="{DynamicResource {x:Static SystemColors.GrayTextBrushKey}}"/> </Trigger> <Trigger Property="Width" Value="Auto"> <Setter Property="MinWidth" Value="150"/> </Trigger> </ControlTemplate.Triggers> </ControlTemplate> <Style x:Key="ButtonBorderStyle" TargetType="Border"> <Setter Property="CornerRadius" Value="10"/> <Setter Property="Width" Value="70"/> <Setter Property="Background" Value="##FFB9B9BB"/> <Setter Property="Cursor" Value="Hand"/> </Style> <Style x:Key="BorderStyle" TargetType="Border"> <Setter Property="CornerRadius" Value="10"/> <Setter Property="BorderThickness" Value="1"/> <Setter Property="Background" Value="##FFC6D9D9"/> <Setter Property="Margin" Value="0,0,0,10"/> </Style>
</Window.Resources> <Window.Content> <StackPanel Margin="20"> <Border Style="{StaticResource ResourceKey=BorderStyle}"> <StackPanel Orientation="Horizontal"> <Label Content="IP:" HorizontalAlignment="Center"/> <TextBox Name="IpBox" HorizontalContentAlignment="Center" Template="{StaticResource ResourceKey=TextBoxBaseControlTemplate}"/> </StackPanel> </Border> <Border Style="{StaticResource ResourceKey=BorderStyle}"> <StackPanel Orientation="Horizontal"> <Label Content="Port:" HorizontalAlignment="Center"/> <TextBox Name="PortBox" HorizontalContentAlignment="Center" Template="{StaticResource ResourceKey=TextBoxBaseControlTemplate}"/> </StackPanel> </Border>
